model.description: Lagrangian model software to use for simulation.

lon.description: Central longitude for seeding drifters. Only used if `seed_flag=="elements"`.

lat.description: Central latitude for seeding drifters. Only used if `seed_flag=="elements"`.

geojson.description: GeoJSON describing a polygon within which to seed drifters. To use this parameter, also have `seed_flag=="geojson"`. If None, seed drifters at or around a single point defined by lon and lat along with seed_flag=="elements".

seed_flag.description: Method for seeding drifters. Options are "elements" or "geojson". If "elements", seed drifters at or around a single point defined by lon and lat. If "geojson", seed drifters within a polygon described by a GeoJSON object.

start_time_end.description: If used, this creates a range of start times for drifters, starting with `start_time` and ending with `start_time_end`. Drifters will be initialized linearly between the two start times.

time_step.description: Interval between particles updates, in seconds.

time_step_output.description: Time step at which element properties are stored and eventually written to file. Must be a multiple of time_step.

steps.description: Maximum number of steps. End of simulation will be start_time + steps*time_step. steps, end_time, or duration must be input by user.

duration.description: The length of the simulation. steps, end_time, or duration must be input by user.

end_time.description: The end of the simulation. steps, end_time, or duration must be input by user.

ocean_model.description: Name of ocean model to use for driving drifter simulation, by default None. Use None for testing and set up. Otherwise input a string. Options are "NWGOA", "CIOFS", "CIOFSOP", "CIOFSFRESH". Alternatively keep as None and set up a separate reader (see example in docs).

ocean_model_local.description: Set to True to use local version of known `ocean_model` instead of remote version.

surface_only.description: Set to True to keep drifters at the surface, by default None. If this flag is set to not-None, it overrides do3D to False, vertical_mixing to False, and the z value(s) 0. If True, this flag also turns off reading model output below 0.5m if drift_model is not Leeway to save time.

do3D.description: Set to True to run drifters in 3D, by default False. This is overridden if surface_only==True. If True, vertical advection and mixing are turned on with options for setting diffusivitymodel, background_diffusivity, ocean_mixed_layer_thickness, vertical_mixing_timestep. If False, vertical motion is disabled.

use_static_masks.description: Set to True to use static masks for known models instead of wetdry masks. If False, the masks are change in time.

output_file.description: Name of file to write output to. If None, default name is used.

output_format.description: Output file format. Options are "netcdf" or "parquet".

use_cache.description: Set to True to use cache for storing interpolators. This saves time on repeat simulations, may be used for other items in the future.

interpolator_filename.description: Filename to save interpolator to. The full path should be given, but no suffix. Use this to either read from an existing file at a non-default location or to save to a non-default location. If None and use_cache==True, default name is used.
